abilities.name: Critical Refraction
info: At the start of each combat all enemies are inflicted with a -40% Critical Damage Debuff for the remainder of the encounter, or until Violet is defeated.
Heavy Attacks inflict a Shock dealing 3% damage per second for 10 seconds. (Max Stacks: 1)

Basic Attacks have a 10% chance to grant allies a 20% Defense Buff that lasts for 10 seconds. (Max Stacks: 3) If Violet's target is inflicted with Shock, her Basics have a 35% chance to grant a Defense Buff.

abilities.name: Uv Force Fields
info: Violet grants a Force Field to all allies (Max Stacks: 1). The strength of a Force Field is equal to 50% of Violet's Defense at the time of creation. Force Fields absorb Basic and Heavy projectiles and will last for 10 seconds or until destroyed.
While a Force Field is active, the protected ally gains 100% Resistance to Shock and Burn damage.
For the first 5 seconds while a Force Field is active, it grants 2% Armor per second to the ally.

abilities.name: Ultra Violet
info: Violet grants a Force Field to allies at the start of each combat and Armor granted from Force Fields is increased by an additional 2%.
The strength of Violet’s Force Fields is increased by an additional 50% of her Defense.

talents.name: Steady Hands
talents.info: Grants +20% Defense at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Blooming Strength
talents.info: Grants +20% Attack at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Shirinking Violet
talents.info: Once per encounter while at or below 50% HP, Violet gains a 20% Defense Buff that lasts for the rest of the encounter. She also gains an Invisible Buff for 15 seconds, greatly lowering enemy aggression towards her.

talents.name: Deflection Field
talents.info: Violet's Critical Damage Debuff removes an additional -40% Critical Damage from enemies.

talents.name: Electrostatic Pulse
talents.info: When a Force Field is destroyed or expires, enemies are inflicted with a Shock dealing 5% damage per second for 10 seconds. While Violet is in the encounter, Shocks inflicted by other allies deal an additional 10% damage.

talents.name: Incredible Defenses
talents.info: When a Force Field is applied to an ally, adjacent enemies are Knocked Back. Allies Resist 30% Basic and Heavy Attack damage from Tank and Melee enemies while Force Fields are active.
